mdRecord.dcterms:description: List t.p. illustration: Putti flanking a crown surrounded by ribbons upon which names of composers are inscribed. Below are two columns with wind player and harpist inscribed, lions on top, and portraits of composers in the base. Between the columns is a scene from a concert hall..
Advertisement on t.p. verso and continuing on p. [11]: Catalogue : piano solos. On p. [12]: Alpine storm : a summer idyl / Charles Kunkel.
